title: From Black lives to 'white spectacle,' Portland protests have lost focus, civil rights leaders say
description: Black leaders in Portland, Oregon, are urging protesters to shift their focus back to the Black Lives Matter movement and away from what's become a “white spectacle.”
content: PORTLAND, Ore. Black community leaders are urging local protesters to shift the focus of demonstrations back to the Black Lives Matter movement and away from what has become a largely white spectacle… [+5870 chars]
source.name: NBC News
